title: Print replaces "R" in PDF with "T"
content: I am trying to print this PDF file. When I print through Firefox, the "R" characters are replaced with "T"s Printing with any other application such as preview on my mac does not result in this issue.
creator: kauffman.marcus.e

title: My browser plays a notification sound repeatedly.
content: My browser plays a notification sound repeatedly. Possibly every time a window opens. It sounds so many times its annoying. The sound is the same as when I plug a device into my computer. Such as a mouse. But it happens as I open or close a window. And sometimes when it seems there's nothing visible happening. The sound occurs three or four times in a row sometimes.
creator: thewirewicks

title: Apple version for Mobile download of Firefox
content: I went on Apple app store and there are many Firefox downloads from which to choose. I have an iphone 15 Max Pro and the version the internet said to choose isn't among those on Apple's app. You've sent me links and don't seem accessible, at least for me. My iphone is currently Safari/Bing. Mac is Firefox/Bing. Thanks much, Avril Levinsohn alevinsohn@nyc.rr.com
creator: alevinsohn

title: How do I disable these annoying Firefox pop ups???
content: How do I disable these annoying Firefox pop ups??? This happened a few months ago and I wound up buying a new computer - now the same crap is happening on this new computer..... It takes up a good portion of the right - lower portion of my screen......I delete one of the three, another takes its place......sick of this
